attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ordinary MPs should be paid twice the national median average salary, ministers three times and the PM four.  Therefore, it is in the best interest of MPs to work to raise the pay of the ordinary worker: something that isn't necessary at the moment

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
